title: Himi 247
lyrics:
M.L.
1.
Ko Sihova ko e ‘Eiki
‘O e langi mo māmani;
‘Oku fai mā’oni’oni,
Ki he kakai kotoa pē.
2.
Ko hotau ‘Otua ia,
Ke tau manavahē ki ai
Ko hotau mo’ui’anga,
Ke tau fa’a kumi ki ai.
3.
Pea ‘oku māfimafi,
‘A e Eiki, ko Sihova;
‘Oku pule fai ma’u ai pē,
Ki he me’a kotoa pē.
4.
Ke fai fakafeta’i ma’u pē,
Ki he ‘Otua mo’oni
‘E he kakai kotoa pē,
‘Oku nofo ‘i māmani. *
